about_the_game:
13 popular Rabi-Ribi battle tracks have been reinterpreted as 8-bit remixes. Listening to these nostalgic tunes makes it feel like you have been transported back to the 90s, sitting in front of a bulky and heavy CRT TV and blowing on cartridges while you eagerly think of going on more adventures in your excitement.

Besides the classic Get On With It and Brawl Breaks, fan favorite M.R. has also been given a new lease of life with its 8-bit remix. What are you waiting for? Come along for a trip through time!

name: Rabi-Ribi - Soundtrack 8-bit Remix

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 87 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 296 MB available space
